com.aetrion.flickr.util
Interface AuthStore

All Known Implementing Classes:
FileAuthStore
public interface AuthStore

Defines an interface for possibly persistent storage of token information.

Version:
$Id: AuthStore.java,v 1.2 2007/09/09 17:15:57 x-mago Exp $
Author:
Matthew MacKenzie
